Project_Identification_Enter_Reference_N.isrctn_reference_number_textbox_label: International standard randomised controlled trial number (ISRCTN)

Label_Texts.enter_reference_numbers_hint_label: Enter reference numbers for your project. If any of these don't apply to your project you can leave them blank.
Label_Texts.isrctn_reference_number_textbox_hint_lab: Enter a reference with the format ISRCTN followed by 8 numbers, for example ISRCTN12345678
Label_Texts.nct_reference_number_textbox_hint_label: Enter a reference with the format NCT followed by 8 numbers, for example NCT12345678
Label_Texts.funder_name_textbox_hint_label: Enter the name of the organisation responsible for funding all or part of this project
Label_Texts.funder_reference_number_textbox_hint_lab: Enter the reference number provided by the funder
Label_Texts.other_reference_number_textbox_hint_labe: If your project has another type of reference, enter the name or a description of it here
Label_Texts.what_other_is_textbox_hint_label: If your project has another type of reference, enter the number here

Project_Reference.funder_name_textbox: This is a sample input text used to validate maximum allowed field length of exactly 101 characters!.
Project_Reference.what_other_is_textbox: This is a sample input text used to validate maximum allowed field length of exactly 101 characters!.

Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.isrctn_reference_number_textbox: Enter an ISRCTN number in the correct format
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.nct_reference_number_textbox: Enter an NCT number in the correct format
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.funder_name_textbox: Funder name must be 100 characters or less
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.funder_reference_number_textbox: Funder reference number must be 25 characters or less
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.other_reference_number_textbox: Other reference number must be 25 characters or less
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.what_other_is_textbox: What 'other' is must be 100 characters or less

Project_Reference.new_short_project_title_text: QA_Automation - Max short study title length one two three four five six seven eight nine ten one END
Project_Reference.new_full_project_title_text: QA_Automation - Max full study title length one two three four five six seven eight nine ten one  END

Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.new_short_project_title_text: Short project title must be between 3 to 100 characters
Field_Summary_Error_Message_Invalid_Proj.new_full_project_title_text: Full project title must be 2000 characters or less
